snippet: A DNA test confirmed that a Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for years is the father of a 6-year-old girl who escaped from his house with the women, a prosecutor said on Friday.
abstract: DNA test confirms that Ariel Castro, Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for years, is father of 6-year-old girl who escaped from his house with the women.
lead_paragraph: A DNA test confirmed that a Cleveland man accused of holding three women captive for years is the father of a 6-year-old girl who escaped from his house with the women, a prosecutor said on Friday.

headline.main: Ohio: DNA Test Confirms Paternity of Captive’s Child
headline.print_headline: Ohio: DNA Test Confirms Paternity of Captive’s Child
